full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG GI BSTOD PA RKANG BRGYAD 'DON THABS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG YAB YUM GYI RKANG BRGYAD KYI BSTOD PA'I 'DOD THABS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI NGAG DBANG SMON LAM GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG LA GZHI BYAS TE, THON CI PI LIG THU MKHAN PA NGAG DBANG RNAM RGYAL GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI DAD BRTZON NGAG DBANG 'OD ZER BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
